Description: Fragment of plain weave, undyed linen; at one end, a band of empty warp threads bordered on both sides by two single threads of purple wool, with a fringe of warp threads beyond; Warp: linen, S spun, c. 23 tpc; Weft: linen and wool, S spun, c. 13 tpc; Edges: 3 ragged cut, 1 with fringe
Curator's comments: Previous location Cupboard 64, green box; Information from hero Granger-Taylor (24.8.1989)
Condition: Poor, stained; Unknown date stuck to sticky net
Acquisition notes: Collection purchased at sale on 6th Dec 1954, lots 154, 155 and 156.
